Constructor which sets all required fields of this object.

Parameters:
relationManager - Managing the connection and interaction with the database.
algorithm - The applied algorithm for the scheduling process.
program - The current program which is being scheduled.
resume - Whether this scheduling task is a resume or a fresh start.
Method Detail

getAlgorithm

public Algorithm getAlgorithm()
Returns:
The applied algorithm for the scheduling process.

getCurrentProgramBeingScheduled

public Program getCurrentProgramBeingScheduled()
Returns:
The current program which is being scheduled.

hasFailed

public boolean hasFailed()
Returns:
Flag to indicate this task has failed.

run

public void run()
Runs the algorithm until it is finished or this thread was interrupted.

Before starting the algorithm the query cache of the RelationManager is enabled in order to improve the performance.

If the scheduling was interrupted due to any exception the task will be flagged indicating it has failed.

In any case the query cache is disabled again.

Specified by:
run in interface Runnable
